title: CHURCH / WATERBASINS
description: Waterbasin dialogue for solving the "Move the waterbasins" task.

dialogueTree.title: Water Bowls: "It's awfully silent again, as if so..."
dialogueTree.text: It's awfully silent again, as if someone turned off the entire world outside those walls. Water inside the bowls stands still.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Measurements have been marked down..."
links.text: Measurements have been marked down around the bowls, each chalk-drawn line representing a centimetre on the floor.

links.title: Interfacing: "Oh boy, this is going to be good."
links.text: Oh boy, this is going to be good.

links.text: Move the third bowl from the left two centimetres away.

links.title: Water Bowls: "It moves like a ghost without creat..."
links.text: It moves like a ghost without creating a single trace of sound.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: "The lead programmer sends you an en..."
links.text: The lead programmer sends you an encouraging thumbs up from across the hall.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Time to run back! Or maybe walk, th..."
links.text: Time to run back! Or maybe walk, this *is* a sacred place after all...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "*And* your leg still hurts from the..."
links.text: *And* your leg still hurts from the tribunal.

links.title: Logic: "This task is an insult to your ment..."
links.text: This task is an insult to your mental skills.

links.title: You: "Move the fourth bowl from the left..."
links.text: Move the fourth bowl from the left five centimetres to the right.

links.title: Water Bowls: "Some water spills out of the bowl,..."
links.text: Some water spills out of the bowl, wetting the floor.
